head.title: Merge {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to integrate {{FileFormatUp}} document merging capabilities into your {{EnvNameShort}} projects.

header.title: Merge {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can build advanced {{EnvNameShort}} applications that seamlessly merge and manage {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing solution that supports over 50 file formats, including PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and archives. Perform operations such as merging, splitting, extracting, reordering, and removing pages with ease.

more_features.title: Document merging tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} supports over 50 widely used business file formats, offering flexible document manipulation features.

feature_1.title: Merge different document formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and more. Customize merge settings by selecting specific pages for processing.

feature_2.title: Page manipulation
feature_2.content: Rearrange, remove, or swap pages to structure your documents according to your needs.

feature_3.title: Adjust page appearance
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle and switch between landscape and portrait orientation for supported file formats.

feature_4.title: Extract pages
feature_4.content: Extract selected pages and save them as a separate document or file.

formats.title: Merge various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, enabling efficient document merging and processing.

examples.comment_2: Merge the document with another file
examples.comment_3: Save the merged document to the desired location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) enables seamless merging of {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications by combining multiple files into one.
content.step_1: Provide the path to the first {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Select the second file to merge.
content.step_3: Configure additional merge options if required.
content.step_4: Execute the merge and save the output file.

code_1.title: Merge files of different formats
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to merge multiple files of supported formats into a single output file.
code_1.comment_2: Merge it with a Microsoft Word document
code_1.comment_3: Add a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet to the result
code_1.comment_4: Save the merged file to the desired location
